name: Fortinet FortiDDoS-F操作系统命令注入漏洞
product: ["Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=7.0.0\uff0c<=7.0.2", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.6.0\uff0c<=6.6.3", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.5.0\uff0c<=6.5.1", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.4.0\uff0c<=6.4.2", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.3.0\uff0c<=6.3.5", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.2.0\uff0c<=6.2.3", "Fortinet FortiDDoS-F >=6.1.0\uff0c<=6.1.5"]
description: Fortinet FortiDDoS-F是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的一款分布式拒绝服务防护系统。Fortinet FortiDDoS-F存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，该漏洞源于特殊元素中和不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞可能导致执行任意代码或命令。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-24-344
patch: Fortinet FortiDDoS-F操作系统命令注入漏洞的补丁
